mapper.select:
select FRONTSERIALDATA,PRODUCTCODE,REQUESTDATE,REQUESTTIME, ACTIONCODE,ACTIONTYPE,TRADEORG,TRADENAME,REMARK,DEALSTATUS, TRADEDATE,TYPEOFEVENT,COMMENTS,AMOUNT1,AMOUNT2,SPOTRATE, SPLITRATE,VALUEDATE,DOWNLOADKEY,USERS_SHORTNAME,PAIRS_SHORTNAME, FOLDERS_SHORTNAME,CPTY_SHORTNAME,FOLDERS_SPOT1SHORTNAME, FOLDERS_SPOT2SHORTNAME,CURRENCIES_SPLITSHORTNAME,CLEARINGMODESSHORTNAME, PAIRS_SPLITSHORTNAME,PAIRS_LOCALSHORTNAME,PURPOSESSHORTNAME,SENDSTATE FROM KON_MIDSPOTTRADE WHERE FRONTSERIALDATA LIKE '%${rpcNo}%'
and REQUESTDATE >= #{startDate} and #{endDate} >= REQUESTDATE
ORDER BY REQUESTDATE DESC,REQUESTTIME DESC
